message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This is a fair offer considering the quality and benefits of this product.
I understand the product's value, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,000?
